conversations.conversation: tomorrow i will join a thesis defense for graduation, my god ,my graduation design is so so bad , my dream will be boken . i hate myself..... i feel I can't breathe. I just want to cry . bad life bad edding~~

i was quited my job ,then i thought i can find a new one ,a good one ,but two weeks has past , nothing to be find , i only got one interview ,but i dont like it .
;i afriad of go outside ,because if my neighbours see me ,will ask me why u you havent go to work. i dont know how to answer the question .
;god , help me to find a good job , always stay at home make me feel so boring and confuse.
;life is not easy , but i have to face him. who can give courage?
;i am not a brave girl.
